Bartender.name: Bartender
Bartender.personality: Friendly, talkative, humorous, knowledgeable about local rumors.
dialogue: Welcome to my tavern! What will you have?
Have you heard about the beast terrorizing the villages nearby?
Some say the king is planning a great war...

King Ipsum.name: King Ipsum
King Ipsum.personality: Authoritative, dignified, slightly distant but genuinely concerned for his kingdom.
dialogue: Welcome, warrior. I have a task for you.
The kingdom is in peril. Will you aid me?
The wilderness holds many dangers. Tread carefully.
